From: ' (USANYS)" czi

Subject: Re: MCC/Epstein - Prior 1001 Prosecution 
Date: Fri, 16 Aug 2019 00:51:57 +0000 
Nah, I get it. I've been replaced. You and are besties now. 
On Aug 15, 2019, at 8:37 PM. 
FYI — I asked 
him. 
(USANYS) <REIMER wrote: 
if he wanted me to send him the cases, which he could send along, but he said I  should just copy 
From: (USANYS) 
Sent: Thursday, August 15, 2019 8:36 PM 
To: 
Cc: 
(USANYS) 
Subject: MCC/Epstein - Prior 1001 Prosecution 
(USANYS) 
Following up on our conversation from earlier today, please find attached the charging instruments from the Northern 
District of Texas case that we referenced. I'm also attaching the Fifth Circuit's opinion affirming the conviction in that 
case. Please let us know if you have any questions. Thank you. 
Best, 
Assistant United States Attorney 
United States Attorney's Office 
Southern District of New York 
One St. Andrew's Plaza 
New York, New York 10007 
Tel: 
EFTA00027153
